description: I. A better deal for consumers: consultation on proposal to ban the use of bills of sale for consumer lending. Dec 2009. Incl. annexes. 38 p. II. Impact Assessment of proposals to address problems in relation to the use of Bills of Sale for consumer lending. 33 p. III. Letters dated 01/2010 from Kevin Brennan MP to Kenneth Clarke MP, Peter Luff MP and Vince Cable MP regarding the consultation on the proposal to ban the use of bills of sale for consumer lending. 1 p.
department: Department for Business, Innovation and Skills
